Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/keywords/1801204276035575808/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Generate a PAA list for One Keyword"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/keywords/1801204276035575808/)_"
---
As a digital marketer, you want to optimize your website's search engine ranking by generating Google PAA (People Also Ask) results for a specific keyword. To do this, you need to brainstorm a list of questions related to the keyword that users may also search for. Craft your questions in a way that is clear, concise, and natural sounding. Remember that the goal is to provide valuable information to users while also increasing your website's visibility.

Your task is to generate a list of Google PAA questions in [TARGETLANGUAGE] for the keyword [PROMPT]. I only need this list without any conclusion and introduction. Start writing only the list.
PromptHint: Put one Keyword: e.g: Wireless Bell
